name: Unix time
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-3-task-4.png)

Since January 1, 1970, time has been counting down on Unix systems.

Create a `unixTime` variable and assign a value to the number 1970.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const age = 38;
```
